CustomField.description: % of days completed in this month (e.g., 10% = 3 days through a 30 day month)
CustomField.formula: DAY(TODAY()) / (IF( MONTH(TODAY())= 12, DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), 12, 31) - TODAY(), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()) + 1, 1) - TODAY() - 1) + DAY(TODAY()))
CustomField.label: Progress in Month
